doc.field: Series H: Cornelia Conway Felton Horsford (Nellie)
Series H: Cornelia Conway Felton Horsford (Nellie)
Fiske, Dr. Augustus Henry: East Providence, RI
Fiske, Dr. Augustus Henry: East Providence, RI
24 United States Patents, 5 Letters, 2 Envelopes, 1 Legal Record with Notation & Postage
Addressed To: "Dr. Augustus [Henry] Fiske, Rumford Chemical Works, Rumford, RI" ; "Miss Cornelia Conway Felton Horsford, Sylvester Manor, Shelter Island, Suffolk County, NY"
Sent From: "Chief Chemist, Augustus Henry Fiske, Ph.D., Rumford Chemical Works, Rumford, RI" ; "Librarian Lawrence C. Wroth, The John Carter Brown Library, Providence, RI"

In Reference To: Academic / Business / Chemistry / Education / Family / Financial Legal / Personal / Professional / Science; 1 Sketch "Colors of this Boat" by C.A. Collins, Jr. with 2 Printed Patent Illustration Fragments; Eben Norton Horsford's Giessen Academy Chemistry Student Agreement, Last Will & Testament [Typed Copy, Item III] & Patents:
"Improved Composition for Filling Fire-Proof Safes" (Witnesses A. Pollok, Lawrence A. Sneden)
"Improved Double Phosphate of Lime and Soda for Culinary and Other Purposes" (Witnesses H.N. Stimpson, Francis L. Chapman)
"Improved Fire-Proof Safe" (Witnesses J. Snowden Bell, William D. Baldwin)
"Improved Manufacture of Acid Phosphates to be Used in Food" (Witnesses A. Pollok, Edmond F. Brown)
"Improved Method of Preparing Acid Phosphate of Lime" (Witnesses George F. Wilson, M.G. Howe)
"Improved Preparation of Acid Phosphate of Lime" (Witnesses A. Pollok, Edmond F. Brown)
"Improved Process of Treating Acid Phosphates in the Manufacture of Yeast Powders, etc." (With George F. Wilson, Witnesses William Hedge, W.H. McGrenery)
"Improvement in Apparatus For Concentrating Acid Phosphate Of Lime" (With George F. Wilson, Witnesses William Hedge, W.H. McGrenery)
"Improvement in Cooking Apparatus" (Witnesses E.E. Masson, E.C. Weaver)
"Improvement in Fire-Proof Safes or Chests" (Witnesses A. Pollok, Lawrence A. Sueden)
"Improvement in Preparing Farinaceous Food" (Witnesses William Henry Arnoux, Frederick N. Dodge) [2 Copies]
"Improvement in Preparing Phosphoric Acid as a Substitute for Other Solid Acids" (Witnesses Chauncey Smith, William T. Richardson)
"Improvement in Pulverulent Acid for Use in the Preparation of Soda-Powders, Farinaceous Food, And for Other Purposes" [Fragment]
"Improvement in the Manufacture and Use of Neutral Sulphite of Lime" (Witnesses Charles S. Merrick, George F. Wilson)
"Improvement in the Manufacture of Beverages for Medicinal and Other Purposes" (Witnesses William Hedge, Winslow Warren, Jr.)
"Improvement in the Manufacture of a Non-Hygroscopic Pulverulent Acid Phosphate" (Witnesses Ebenezer Roby, Charles L. Richards)
"Improvement in the Manufacture of Phosphate of Lime and Yeast-Powders" (Witnesses C.H. Hunnewell, B.W. Whitney)
"Improvement in the Manufacture of Phosphates and in Extracting Phosphoric Acid From Bones" (With George F. Wilson, Witnesses William Hedge, W.H. McGrenery)
"Improvement in the Manufacture of Phosphoric Acid, and Phosphates for Use in the Preparation of Food, and for Other Purposes" (Witnesses M. Bailey, Charles G. Page, Jr.)
"Improvement in Treating Cotton and Linen Waste" (Witnesses W.G. Stearns, G.M. Osgood)
"Improvement in Treating the Mixture of Phosphate of Lime and Farinaceous Matters in Order to Granulate Them" (With George F. Wilson, Witnesses William Hedge, W.H. McGrenery)
"Preparing Alkaline Bicarbonates" (With Charles A. Catlin, Witnesses N.D. Arnold, C.F. Chaffee)
"Pulverulent Preparation of Phosphoric Acid" (Witnesses H.S. Eustis, George A. Bartlett)
"Pulverulent Preparation of Phosphoric Acid" (Witnesses Charles P. Shillaber, N.D. Arnold)
Typed, Printed & Handwritten in Ink & Pencil
Fiske, Dr. Augustus Henry: East Providence, RI : 1844 - 1883; 1933 June 5; 1936 June 12, 18 & October 26
